</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	3.1.5
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	does not enter into any material contract valued in
	excess of RMB 10,000 without the prior written consent of Party A, except
	in the ordinary course of business;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	3.1.6
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	does not, under any circumstance, enter into any contract
	valued in excess of RMB 200,000 without the prior written consent of Party
	A;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	3.1.6
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	does not extend any loan or credit to any party, or
	provide any guarantee or assume any obligation of any party, without the
	prior written consent of Party A;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	3.1.7
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	provides all information relating to its operations and
	financial affairs to Party A upon Party A&#146;s request;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	3.1.8
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	does not merge or consolidate with any third party or
	acquire or invest in any third party, without the prior written consent of
	Party A;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	3.1.9
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	notifies Party A immediately should any legal action,
	arbitration or administrative procedure relating to its assets, operations
	or income arise or become likely to arise;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	3.1.10
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	promptly executes all documents and takes all other
	actions which are reasonably necessary for the lawful performance of the
	provisions and aim of this Agreement and the documents beneficial to this
	Agreement;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	3.1.11
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	does not pay dividends or distributions of any kind to
	its shareholders without the prior written consent of Party A.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	3.2
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Personal Undertakings of Party B and Party C
</B>
	.
	Party B and Party C each further undertakes to:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	3.2.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	cause a shareholders meeting of the Company to vote in
	favor of the transfer of his share of the Equity Interests as contemplated
	hereunder, at the request of Party A;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>

	&nbsp;
</TD>

</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	promptly execute all documents and take all other actions
	which are reasonably necessary for the lawful performance of the
	provisions and objective of this Agreement and the documents beneficial to
	this Agreement;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

	contracts.

<B>
	6.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	BREACH OF CONTRACT
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>

<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.1
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Breach
</B>
	. A party shall be deemed to be in breach of
	this Agreement if:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.1.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	he fails to perform its obligations under this Agreement
	fully and in a timely manner, and does not rectify any such failure within
	30 days after written demand from any other party requesting the same;
	or
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.1.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	any representation or warranty made by such party
	hereunder proves to be or becomes materially false, misleading or
	untrue.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.2
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Liability for Breach
</B>
	. Any party that breaches this
	Agreement shall indemnify the other parties against, and compensate them
	for, any damages or loss incurred as a result, including third party
	claims.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	7.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	CONFIDENTIALITY
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.1
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Confidentiality Obligations
</B>
	. Each party
	(&#147;
<B>
	Receiving Party
</B>
	&#148;) shall maintain the strict confidentiality of
	any and all Confidential Information of any other party (&#147;
<B>
	Disclosing
	Party
</B>
	&#148;) to which it may become privy before or during the performance
	of this Agreement, and shall not disclose any such Confidential
	Information to any third party except to its relevant employees, officers,
	affiliates and advisors (as applicable) on a &#147;need-to-know&#148; basis and
	provided that the aforesaid recipients of Confidential Information are
	subject to written confidentiality undertakings which are no less strict
	than the obligations set out herein. Any Confidential Information of the
	Disclosing Party which is received by the Receiving Party
	hereunder shall be used for the sole purpose of performing this Agreement
	and such other purpose as the Disclosing Party shall have permitted in
	writing.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TD WIDTH="5%">

	7.2
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Exceptions
</B>
	. The disclosure of Confidential
	Information by the Receiving Party shall not be deemed a breach of its
	confidentiality obligations under the following circumstances;
</P>
</TD>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;

<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.2.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Disclosing Party has given its prior written consent
	to the disclosure;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.2.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Confidential Information has entered the public
	domain through no fault or wrongful act of the Receiving Party;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.2.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Confidential Information has been rightfully received
	by the Receiving Party from a third party which developed such information
	independently and was not subject to any confidentiality obligation with
	regard to the same;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.2.4
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Confidential Information was, prior to this Agreement
	or any other separate non-disclosure agreement previously existing between
	the parties and independently developed by the Receiving Party without the
	use, directly or indirectly, of the Confidential Information; or
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.2.5
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	where the disclosure of Confidential Information is
	required pursuant to law or a court order of competent jurisdiction,
	provided that such disclosure shall be limited to the extent required by
	such applicable law or court order, and provided further that the
	Receiving Party has notified the Disclosing Party of the need to disclose
	the Confidential Information in question, such that the Disclosing Party
	shall have the opportunity to oppose the disclosure thereof by means of
	any available objections or appeals.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	8.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	FORCE MAJEURE
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	8.1
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	A party who is not able to perform its obligations
	hereunder as a direct result of Force Majeure, shall not be deemed to be
	in breach of this Agreement, provided that the following conditions are
	satisfied simultaneously:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	8.1.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	its failure to perform its obligations hereunder has been
	directly caused by Force Majeure;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	8.1.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	it has used commercially reasonable efforts to perform
	its obligations hereunder and, has taken necessary precautions
	to reduce the losses to the other parties arising from the
	Force Majeure;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>

	&nbsp;

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	8.1.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	it has immediately informed the other parties in writing
	after the occurrence of Force Majeure; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	8.1.4
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	it has provided written information and supporting
	documentation, including a statement of the reasons for the delay in
	implementing or partially implementing this Agreement, within 15 days
	after the occurrence of Force Majeure.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	9.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	GOVERNING LAW
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in
	accordance with the laws of the PRC.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	10.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	DISPUTE RESOLUTION
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	10.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	If any dispute arises in connection with this Agreement,
	the parties shall attempt in the first instance to resolve it through
	friendly consultations or mediation. If any dispute cannot be resolved
	within thirty (30) days after the commencement of discussions, such
	dispute shall be referred to and finally resolved by arbitration in
	Beijing under the auspices of the China International Economic and Trade
	Arbitration Commission in accordance with the Commission&#146;s then-current
	arbitration rules. The arbitration shall be conducted in [both the English
	and Chinese] languages before a tribunal of three (3) arbitrators
	appointed in accordance with the said rules.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	10.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The arbitral award shall be final and binding on the
	parties. The winning party may, at the cost and expense of the losing
	party(ies), apply to any court of competent jurisdiction for enforcement
	of such arbitral award.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	10.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	During the period when the dispute is being resolved,
	except for the matters under dispute, the parties shall continue
	performing this Agreement in all respects.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	11.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	MISCELLANEOUS
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Notices
</B>
	. All notices or other communications
	hereunder shall be written in English, and delivered in person (including
	by courier), by first class mail or facsimile, to the addresses set forth
	below. A notice shall be deemed to have been delivered (a) on the date of
	signing of the delivery receipt in the case of delivery in person
	(including by courier); (b) on the 10
<SUP>
	th
</SUP>
	day of the mailing date
	in the case of delivery by mail; and (c) on the date recorded in the
	transmission record in the case of facsimile, unless delivery is made
	after 5 pm on a Business Day or on a non-Business Day in the place of receipt,
	in which case delivery shall be deemed to occur at 9 am on the following
	Business Day.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Entire Agreement
</B>
	. This Agreement constitutes the
	entire agreement among the parties in respect of the subject matter hereof
	and shall supersede any previous discussions, negotiations and agreements
	related thereto.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Amendment
</B>
	. This Agreement may be amended only by a
	written agreement signed by the parties, which amendment shall be attached
	to this Agreement as an Appendix. If required by law, the parties shall
	obtain all requisite approvals from the relevant authorities to give
	effect to the amendment.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.4
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	No Waiver
</B>
	. Unless otherwise agreed upon by the
	parties in writing, any failure or delay on the part of any party to
	exercise any right, authority or privilege under this Agreement, or under
	any other related agreement, shall not operate as a waiver thereof; nor
	shall any single or partial exercise of any right, authority or privilege preclude
	any other future exercise thereof.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-34_HTM_PAGE_12">
</A>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.5
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Severability
</B>
	. The provisions of this Agreement are
	severable from each other. The invalidity of any provision of this
	Agreement shall not affect the validity or enforceability of any other
	provision of this Agreement.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.6
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Successors.
</B>
	This Agreement shall be valid and
	binding on the parties, their successors and permitted assigns (if
	any).
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.7
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Assignment
</B>
	. Party B, Party C and the Company shall
	not assign any of their rights or obligations hereunder without the prior
	written consent of Party A. Party A shall have the right to assign all or
	any of its rights or obligations under this Agreement to a Designated
	Person at any time. Party B, Party C and the Company shall cooperate fully
	with Party A to affect any such assignment, including without limitation
	signing any documentation.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.8
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Counterparts
</B>
	. This Agreement may be executed in
	any number of counterparts. Each such counterpart shall be deemed to be an
	original instrument, and all such counterparts shall together constitute
	one and the same instrument.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.9
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Languages and Versions
</B>
	. This Agreement is executed
	in four (4) original English language sets. Each party shall retain one
	(1) such original set.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ALIGN=CENTER>
	[
<I>
	The space below is intentionally left blank.
</I>
	]
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=LEFT>
	Call Option Agreement
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=CENTER WIDTH="33%">
	- 10 -
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	caused this Agreement to be executed by their duly authorized representatives on
	the date first indicated above.

<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-35_HTM_PAGE_3">

<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	This
<B>
	EQUITY PLEDGE AGREEMENT
</B>
	(&#147;
<B>
	Agreement
</B>
	&#148;) is
	entered into on this 25 day of January, 2016 (&#147;
<B>
	Signing Date
</B>
	&#148;) in Beijing,
	People&#146;s Republic of China (&#147;
<B>
	PRC
</B>
	&#148;)
<I>
	,
</I>
	by and between:
<B>
</B>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	YOU On Demand (Beijing) Technology Co., Ltd.
</B>
	, a
	limited liability company incorporated under the laws of the PRC, with its
	registered address at Suite 2603, 26/F, Tower A, 10 Jintongxi Road,
	Chaoyang District, Beijing, PRC (&#147;
<B>
	Party A
</B>
	&#148;);
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Wu Bing, a PRC citizen and holder of identity card number
	310104196806292016 (&#147;
<B>
	Party B
</B>
	&#148;); and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Zhu Yun, a PRC citizen and holder of identity card number
	630104197402260543 (&#147;
<B>
	Party C
</B>
	&#148;).
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	(collectively, the &#147;
<B>
	Parties
</B>
	&#148;, individually, a
<B>
</B>
	&#147;
<B>
	Party
</B>
	&#148;)
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	:
<B>
</B>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	A.
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Party B holds 95% and Party C holds 5% of the equity
	interests (&#147;
<B>
	Equity Interests
</B>
	&#148;) of Beijing Sino Top Scope Technology
	Co., Ltd., &#147;
<B>
	Company
</B>
	&#148;), a limited liability company incorporated and
	doing certain business activities in the PRC (&#147;
<B>
	Business
</B>
	&#148;). The
	Equity Interests represent RMB 4.5 million in the registered capital of
	the Company.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	B.
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	On 25 January 2016, Party A and the Company entered into
	a Technical Services Agreement (&#147;
<B>
	Technical Services Agreement
</B>
	&#148;),
	pursuant to which the Company shall pay service fees to Party A for
	various technical, marketing and management consulting and other services
	in connection with the Business.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	C.
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	On 25 January 2016, Party A, Party B, Party C and the
	Company entered into a Call Option Agreement (&#147;
<B>
	Call Option
	Agreement
</B>
	&#148;), pursuant to which Party B and Party C grant to Party A an
	option to purchase all or any part of their Equity Interests.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	D.
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	As security for a total debts of RMB 4.5 million: (a) the
	performance by the Company of its obligations under the Technical Services
	Agreement for a security of RMB 2.25 million; and (b) the performance by
	Party B and Party C of their obligations under the Call Option Agreement
	for a security of RMB 2.25 million, Party B and Party C have agreed to
	pledge the entire Equity Interests to Party A, and Party A has agreed to
	accept such a pledge, in accordance with the terms and conditions set out
	in this Agreement.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	NOW THEREFORE,
</B>
	the Parties agree as follows:
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</TD>

	DEFINITIONS AND
	INTERPRETATIONS
</B>

</TD>

	Agreement

	1.1

	Definitions
</B>

	Agreement, the terms below shall have the meanings set out
	below:
</P>

<BR>

</TD>

</B>

	business in the PRC;
</P>

</B>
<B>
	Information
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="75%">
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	means any information of a confidential nature relating
	to the Parties and the Company, including without limitation any
	confidential information concerning their respective structure, business
	activities (including financial information, client lists and business
	policies), technology, released or unreleased software or hardware
	products, marketing plans, regardless of the format in which such
	information is stored or communicated, and including any excerpts,
	summaries or other derivative forms of the same;
</P>
</TD>

</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="75%">
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	means any fire, flood, war, act of government or other
	natural or man-made event which is unforeseen by the Parties (or if
	foreseen, reasonably unavoidable) and which prevents the performance of
	this Agreement by any or all of the Parties, but excluding any shortage of
	credit;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	1.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Interpretation
</B>
	. All headings used herein are for
	reference purposes only and shall not affect the meaning or interpretation
	of any provision. Any reference to an Article or Appendix is to an article
	or appendix of this Agreement. For purposes of this Agreement, the term
	&#147;PRC&#148; refers to Mainland China, and unless explicitly provided herein does
	not include the Special Administrative Regions of Hong Kong and Macau or
	the territory of Taiwan. References to the masculine shall include
	the feminine and vice versa.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>

<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	2.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	PLEDGE
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	2.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Pledge
</B>
	. Each of Party B and Party C hereby agrees
	to pledge his entire share of the Equity Interests to Party A pursuant to
	the terms of this Agreement (&#147;
<B>
	Pledge
</B>
	&#148;).
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	2.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Effective Date
</B>
	. The Pledge shall be effective on
	the date on which it has been duly registered pursuant to Article 3. For
	the avoidance of doubt, until Party A has acquired the entire Equity
	Interests by means of exercising its option under the Call Option
	Agreement, the Pledge will continue to be effective.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	3.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	REGISTRATION
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Party B and Party C covenant with Party A that, within 30
	Business Days after the execution of this Agreement, Party B and Party C
	shall complete the registration of the Pledge with the relevant local
	branch of the PRC Administration for Industry and Commerce (&#147;
<B>
	AIC
</B>
	&#148;)
	as instructed by Party A, and Party A shall provide any necessary
	assistance to Party B and Party C to register the Pledge in accordance
	with this Agreement.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	4.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	EXERCISE OF PLEDGE
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	4.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Exercise of Pledge
</B>
	. During the term of this
	Agreement, Party A shall be entitled to exercise the Pledge if the Company
	fails to pay any of the service fees due under the Technical Services
	Agreement, or otherwise breaches the Technical Services Agreement, and
	fails to rectify such breach within 30 days of Party A&#146;s written demand
	for the same.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	4.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	No Hindrance
</B>
	. Party B and Party C shall render
	Party A all necessary assistance in exercising the Pledge, and shall not
	hinder Party A&#146;s exercise thereof hereunder.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	5.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES OF PARTY B AND PARTY
	C
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Party B and Party C each hereby represents and warrants
	that:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	5.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	he is the legal owner of the Equity Interests;
	and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	5.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	he has not pledged or encumbered his respective share of
	the Equity Interests to any person or entity other than Party
	A.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=LEFT>
	Equity Pledge
	Agreement

<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-35_HTM_PAGE_6">
</A>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	6.
</B>
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	COVENANTS OF PARTY B AND PARTY C
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	For the duration of this Agreement, Party B and Party C
	each covenants to Party A that he will:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	not transfer or assign his share of the Equity Interests,
	collect any dividends from the Equity Interests, or create or permit to be
	created any pledge or other encumbrance on the Equity Interests other than
	the Pledge, without the prior written consent of Party A;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	comply with all laws and regulations governing the
	Pledge;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	deliver to Party A any notice, order, or opinion with
	respect to the Pledge which is issued by a competent government authority
	within 5 Business Days of receiving the same, and comply with or object to
	such notice, order or opinion at the direction of Party A;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.4
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	notify Party A in a timely manner of any action, omission
	or other event which may adversely affect the Equity Interests or any of
	the Parties&#146; rights therein, or which may change or preclude his
	performance of any of his obligations under this Agreement;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.5
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	not initiate, nor authorize any other person to initiate,
	any legal procedure or other action which could suspend or hamper Party
	A&#146;s right to exercise the Pledge; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.6
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	execute in good faith all title certificates and
	contracts, perform any necessary actions, and provide any additional
	assistance necessary to perfect Party A&#146;s rights hereunder as requested by
	Party A.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	7.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	EVENTS OF DEFAULT
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.1
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Events of Default
</B>
	. Each of the following events
	shall be considered to be an Event of Default:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.1.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Company fails to make full and timely payment of the
	service fees under the Technical Service Agreement, or if Party A incurs
	any economic loss due to the Company&#146;s breach of its obligations under the
	Technical Services Agreement;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.1.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Party B and/or Party C breach(es) this Agreement,
	including by making any material misleading or fraudulent representations,
	warranties or covenants under Articles 5 and 6;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.1.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Party B and/or Party C waive his/their rights in or to
	the Equity Interests, or transfer or assign any portion of the Equity
	Interests, without the prior written consent of Party
	A;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=LEFT>
	Equity Pledge
	Agreement
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=CENTER WIDTH="33%">
	-&nbsp;4 -
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-35_HTM_PAGE_7">
</A>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.1.4
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	any loan, security, compensation, covenant and/or other
	liability of Party B and/or Party C is/are required to be repaid or
	performed prior to the scheduled date, or is/are due but cannot be repaid
	or performed as scheduled, and thereby causes Party A to deem that the
	capacity of Party B and/or Party C to perform his/their obligations under
	this Agreement has been adversely affected;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.1.5
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Party B and/or Party C is/are incapable of repaying its
	general debt or other debt;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.1.6
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	laws are promulgated which render Party B and/or Party C
	incapable of continuing to perform his/their obligations hereunder without
	violating such laws, or which render this Agreement illegal;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.1.7
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	any approval, permit, license, or authorization from the
	competent government authorities needed to perform or validate this
	Agreement is withdrawn, suspended, invalidated, or materially amended;
	and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.1.8
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	other circumstances occur whereby Party A is incapable of
	exercising the right to dispose of the Pledge in accordance with
	applicable law and the Parties&#146; intentions
	hereunder.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Notice
</B>
	. Party B and/or Party C shall immediately
	serve Party A with a written notice if either or both of them become aware
	that an Event of Default has occurred.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Party A&#146;s Event of Default Rights
</B>
	. Party A may, at
	any time upon the occurrence of an Event of Default: (a) serve a written
	default notice to Party B and/or Party C requiring either or both of them
	immediately to make, or cause to be immediately made, full payment of the
	outstanding payment obligations under the Technical Services Agreement; or
	(b) exercise the Pledge in accordance with Article 4. For the avoidance of
	doubt, Party A&#146;s rights under this Article 7.3 shall be separate from and
	additional to its rights for breach of contract as set out in Article
	9.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	8.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>

	TERM
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	This Agreement shall take effect on the date first
	indicated above and remain in full force and effect until the earlier of
	the date on which:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	8.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Technical Services Agreement and Call Option
	Agreement have been performed in full or otherwise
	terminated;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	8.2
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Pledge is exercised in accordance with Article 4, and
	all subsequent records and other necessary actions have been undertaken by
	Party B and Party C for purposes of the same; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	8.3
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Party A gives, at its sole discretion, notice of release
	of the Pledge to Party B and Party C or other clear instruction in writing
	to the effect that the Pledge under this Agreement shall no longer
	survive.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	9.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	BREACH OF CONTRACT
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	9.1
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Breach
</B>
	. A Party shall be deemed to be in breach of
	this Agreement if:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	9.1.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	it fails to perform its obligations under this Agreement
	fully and in a timely manner, and does not rectify any such failure within
	30 days after written demand from any other Party requesting the same;
	or
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	9.1.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	any representation or warranty made by such Party
	hereunder is as of the Signing Date or becomes, materially false,
	misleading or untrue.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	9.2
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Liability for Breach
</B>
	. Any Party that breaches this
	Agreement shall indemnify the other Parties against, and compensate them
	for, any damages or losses incurred as a result, including third party
	claims.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	10.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	FEES AND EXPENSES
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Party A shall be solely responsible for all fees and
	expenses incurred in relation to this Agreement, including, without
	limitation, legal fees, taxes and government charges, and shall fully
	indemnify Party B and Party C against the payment of any fees or expenses
	incurred at the request and upon the instruction of Party A.
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, each of the Parties shall be responsible
	for their own legal fees incurred as a result of engaging legal counsel
	for the purpose of entering into this Agreement and in the event that any
	dispute arises in connection with this Agreement.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	11.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	CONFIDENTIALITY
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.1
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Confidentiality Obligations
</B>
	. Each Party
	(&#147;
<B>
	Receiving Party
</B>
	&#148;) shall maintain the strict confidentiality of
	any and all Confidential Information of any other Party(ies)
	(&#147;
<B>
	Disclosing Party
</B>
	&#148;) to which it may become privy before or during
	the performance of this Agreement, and shall not disclose any such
	Confidential Information to any third party except to its relevant
	employees, affiliates, officers and advisors (as applicable) on a
	&#147;need-to-know&#148; basis and provided that the aforesaid recipients of
	Confidential Information are subject to written confidentiality
	undertakings which are no less strict than the obligations set out
	herein. Any Confidential Information of the
	Disclosing Party which is received by the Receiving Party hereunder shall be
	used for the sole purpose of performing this Agreement and such other purpose as
	the Disclosing Party shall have permitted in writing.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=LEFT>
	Equity Pledge
	Agreement
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=CENTER WIDTH="33%">
	-&nbsp;6 -
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ALIGN=CENTER WIDTH="100%" COLOR=BLACK NOSHADE SIZE=5>
<A NAME="eolPage269"></A>
<!--$$/PAGE=-->
<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-35_HTM_PAGE_9">
</A>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.2
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Exceptions
</B>
	. The disclosure of Confidential
	Information by the Receiving Party shall not be deemed a breach of its
	confidentiality obligations under the following circumstances;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.2.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Disclosing Party has given its prior written consent
	to the disclosure;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.2.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Confidential Information has entered the public
	domain through no fault or wrongful act of the Receiving Party;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.2.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Confidential Information has been rightfully received
	by the Receiving Party from a third party which developed such information
	independently and was not subject to any confidentiality obligation with
	regard to the same;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.2.4
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Confidential Information was, prior to this Agreement
	or any other separate non-disclosure agreement previously existing between
	the Parties and independently developed by the Receiving Party without the
	use, directly or indirectly, of the Confidential Information; or
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.2.5
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	where the disclosure of Confidential Information is
	required pursuant to law or a court order of competent jurisdiction,
	provided that such disclosure shall be limited to the extent required by
	such applicable law or court order, and provided further that the
	Receiving Party has notified the Disclosing Party of the need to disclose
	the Confidential Information in question, such that the Disclosing Party
	shall have the opportunity to oppose the disclosure thereof by means of
	any available objections or appeals.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	12.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	FORCE MAJEURE
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP COLSPAN=2>
	A Party who is not able to perform its
	obligations hereunder as a direct result of Force Majeure, shall not be
	deemed to be in breach of this Agreement, provided that the following
	conditions are satisfied simultaneously:
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	12.1
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
	its failure to perform its obligations hereunder has
	been directly caused by Force Majeure;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	12.2
</P>
</TD>
<TD>
<DIV ALIGN="JUSTIFY">
	it has used commercially reasonable efforts to perform
	its obligations hereunder and, has taken necessary precautions to reduce
	the losses to the other Parties arising from the Force
	Majeure;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=LEFT>
	Equity Pledge
	Agreement
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=CENTER WIDTH="33%">
	-&nbsp;7 -
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ALIGN=CENTER WIDTH="100%" COLOR=BLACK NOSHADE SIZE=5>

<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-35_HTM_PAGE_10">
</A>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	12.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	it has immediately informed the other Parties in writing
	after the occurrence of Force Majeure; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	12.4
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	it has provided written information and supporting
	documentation, including a statement of the reasons for the delay in
	implementing or partially implementing this Agreement, within 15 days
	after the occurrence of Force Majeure.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	13.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	GOVERNING LAW
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in
	accordance with the laws of the PRC, without giving either reference or
	effect to any principle of conflict of laws or choice of laws.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	14.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	DISPUTE RESOLUTION
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	14.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	If any dispute arises in connection with this Agreement,
	the Parties shall attempt in the first instance to resolve it through
	friendly consultations or mediation. If any dispute cannot be resolved
	within thirty (30) days after the commencement of discussions, such
	dispute shall be referred to and finally resolved by arbitration in
	Beijing under the auspices of the China International Economic and Trade
	Arbitration Commission in accordance with the Commission&#146;s then-current
	arbitration rules. The arbitration shall be conducted in both the English
	and Chinese languages before a tribunal of three (3) arbitrators appointed
	in accordance with the said rules.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	14.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The arbitral award shall be final and binding on the
	parties. The winning party may, at the cost and expense of the losing
	party(ies), apply to any court of competent jurisdiction for enforcement
	of such arbitral award.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	14.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	During the period when the dispute is being resolved,
	except for the matters under dispute, the Parties shall continue to
	perform this Agreement in all respects.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	15.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	MISCELLANEOUS
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	15.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Notices
</B>
	. All notices or other communications
	hereunder shall be written in English, and delivered in person (including
	by courier), by first class mail or facsimile, to the addresses set forth
	below. A notice shall be deemed to have been delivered (a) on the date of
	signing of the delivery receipt in the case of delivery in person
	(including by courier); (b) on the 10th day of the mailing date in the
	case of delivery by mail; and (c) on the date recorded in the transmission
	record in the case of facsimile, unless delivery is made after 5 pm on a
	Business Day or on a non-Business Day in the place of receipt, in which case
	delivery shall be deemed to occur at 9 am on the following Business Day.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	15.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Entire Agreement
</B>
	. This Agreement and any
	appendices attached to it constitutes the entire agreement between the
	Parties in respect of the subject matter hereof and shall supersede any
	previous discussions, negotiations and agreements related
	thereto.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	15.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Amendment
</B>
	. This Agreement may be amended only by a
	written agreement signed by the Parties, which amendment shall be attached
	to this Agreement as an Appendix. If required by law, the Parties shall
	obtain all requisite approvals from the relevant authorities to give
	effect to the amendment.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	15.4
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	No Waiver
</B>
	. Unless otherwise agreed upon by the
	Parties in writing, any failure or delay on the part of any Party to
	exercise any right, authority or privilege under this Agreement, or under
	any other related agreement, shall not operate as a waiver thereof; nor
	shall any single or partial exercise of any right, authority or privilege
	preclude any other future exercise thereof.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	15.5
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Severability
</B>
	. The provisions of this Agreement are
	severable from each other. The invalidity of any provision of this
	Agreement shall not affect the validity or enforceability of any other
	provision of this Agreement.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	15.6
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Successors.
</B>
	This Agreement shall be valid and
	binding on the Parties, their successors and permitted assigns (if
	any).
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-35_HTM_PAGE_12">
</A>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	15.7
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Assignment
</B>
	. Party B and Party C shall not assign
	any of their rights or obligations hereunder without the prior written
	consent of Party A. Party A shall have the right to assign all or any of
	its rights or obligations under this Agreement to a designated person at
	any time. Party B and Party C shall cooperate fully with Party A to affect
	any such assignment, including without limitation signing any
	documentation.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	15.8
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Counterparts
</B>
	. For the convenience of the Parties,
	this Agreement may be executed in any number of counterparts. Each such
	counterpart shall be deemed to be an original instrument, and all such
	counterparts shall together constitute one and the same
	instrument.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	15.9
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Languages and Versions
</B>
	. This Agreement is executed
	in four (4) original sets with both English and Chinese language versions.
	Each Party shall retain one (1) original set and the other one (1)
	original set shall be submitted to the AIC. The English and Chinese
	language versions shall have the same legal effect. In the event of any
	inconsistencies between the English and Chinese language versions, the
	English language version shall prevail.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ALIGN=CENTER>
	[
<I>
	The space below is intentionally left blank.
</I>
	]
</P>

<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-36_HTM_PAGE_1">
</A>
<P ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	Power of Attorney
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	I,
<B>
	Wu Bing,
</B>
	a citizen of the People&#146;s Republic of China
	(&#147;
<B>
	PRC
</B>
	&#148;) and holder of PRC resident ID card number 310104196806292016,
	hereby irrevocably grant, in my capacity as a shareholder of Beijing Sino Top
	Scope Technology Co., Ltd. (&#147;
<B>
	Company
</B>
	&#148;), to any individual appointed in
	writing (&#147;
<B>
	Authorized Person
</B>
	&#148;) by YOU On Demand (Beijing) Technology Co.,
	Ltd. in its sole discretion, the authority to exercise the following powers and
	rights during the term of this Power of Attorney:
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	to receive all notices on my behalf regarding the
	shareholders meetings of the Company;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	to vote on my behalf at such shareholders
	meetings;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	to make any decisions on my behalf in accordance with my
	rights as a shareholder of the Company as granted to me by law and in
	accordance with the Company&#146;s articles of association; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	to sign any relevant documents on my behalf and to take
	any action on my behalf as a shareholder of the
	Company.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	I hereby declare and covenant that during the term of this
	Power of Attorney, I shall not, without the prior written consent of the
	Authorized Person, exercise any of the powers and/or rights listed above.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	This Power of Attorney shall enter into effect upon signing and
	shall remain effective and irrevocable until all of my equity in the Company has
	been transferred to the Company and/or an Authorized Person. This Power of
	Attorney will survive and remain valid and effective in the event of my death
	and/or mental or physical incapacity.
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="5%">
	Name:
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="43%">
<B>
	Wu Bing
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="43%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="5%">
	By:
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="43%">
	/s/ Wu
	Bing
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="43%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="5%">
	Date:
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="43%">
	January 25, 2016
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>

	(&#147;

</B>
	&#148;), to any individual appointed in
	writing (&#147;

</B>
	&#148;) by YOU On Demand (Beijing) Technology Co.,
	Ltd. in its sole discretion, the authority to exercise the following powers and
	rights during the term of this Power of Attorney:
</P>

	(a)
</TD>

	to receive all notices on my behalf regarding the
	shareholders meetings of the Company;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">

</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>

	(b)
</TD>

<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	to vote on my behalf at such shareholders
	meetings;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	to make any decisions on my behalf in accordance with my
	rights as a shareholder of the Company as granted to me by law and in
	accordance with the Company&#146;s articles of association; and
</P>
</TD>

</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>

	(d)
</TD>

<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	to sign any relevant documents on my behalf and to take
	any action on my behalf as a shareholder of the
	Company.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	I hereby declare and covenant that during the term of this
	Power of Attorney, I shall not, without the prior written consent of the
	Authorized Person, exercise any of the powers and/or rights listed above.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	This Power of Attorney shall enter into effect upon signing and
	shall remain effective and irrevocable until all of my equity in the Company has
	been transferred to the Company and/or an Authorized Person. This Power of
	Attorney will survive and remain valid and effective in the event of my death
	and/or mental or physical incapacity.
</P>

	This
<B>
	TECHNICAL SERVICES AGREEMENT
</B>
	(&#147;

	Agreement
</B>
	&#148;)
	is entered into on this 25 day of January, 2016 in Beijing, People&#146;s Republic of
	China (&#147;
<B>
	PRC
</B>
	&#148;), by and between:
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>

<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Beijing Sino Top Scope Technology Co., Ltd.
</B>
	, a
	limited liability company incorporated under the laws of the PRC, with its
	registered address at Suite 2005, Building 11, 5 Huayuan Road, Haidian
	District, Beijing, PRC (&#147;
<B>
	Party A
</B>
	&#148;); and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>

<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	YOU On Demand (Beijing) Technology Co., Ltd.
</B>
	, a
	limited liability company incorporated under the laws of the PRC, with its
	registered address at Suite 2603, 26/F, Tower A, 10 Jintongxi Road,
	Chaoyang District, Beijing, PRC (&#147;
<B>
	Party
	B
</B>
	&#148;).
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	WHEREAS
</B>
	:
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Party A wishes to retain Party B to provide the Services
	(defined below), and Party B is willing to provide the same to Party A, in
	accordance with the terms and conditions set forth below.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	NOW, THEREFORE
</B>
	, the parties agree as follows:
</P>

	1.1

	Definitions.
</B>
	Unless otherwise indicated, the
	following terms in this Agreement shall have the meanings set forth
	below:

<BR>
<DIV>

</TD>

	Business Day
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="75%">
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	means a day in which commercial banks are open for
	business in the PRC;
</P>
</TD>

	Confidential
</B>
<B>
	Information
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="75%">
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	means any information of a confidential nature relating
	to the parties, including without limitation any confidential information
	concerning their respective structure, business activities (including
	financial information, client lists and business policies), technology,
	released or unreleased software or hardware products, and marketing plans,
	regardless of the format in which such information is stored or
	communicated, and including any excerpts, summaries or other derivative
	forms of the same;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="10%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>

	Costs
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="75%">
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	means the direct and indirect costs (other than Expenses)
	incurred by Party B and attributable to the Services performed by Party B
	hereunder, as determined in accordance with United States Generally
	Accepted Accounting Principles (US GAAP);
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>

	reference purposes only and shall not affect the meaning or interpretation
	of any provision. Any reference to an Article or Appendix is to an article
	or appendix of this Agreement. For purposes of this Agreement, the term
	&#147;PRC&#148; refers to Mainland China, and unless explicitly stated herein does
	not include the Special Administrative Regions of Hong Kong and Macao or
	the territory of Taiwan.

	provide the Services in accordance with the terms and conditions set forth

</B>

	Services for the Term of this Agreement.

	2.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Exclusivity.
</B>
	Party A hereby agrees to engage Party
	B as its exclusive provider for the Services for the Term of this
	Agreement. Without the prior written consent of Party B, Party A shall not
	directly or indirectly engage any third party to provide services that are
	identical or similar to the Services.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	3.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	SERVICE FEE AND METHOD OF PAYMENT
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	3.1
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Service Fee.
</B>
	As consideration for the Services,
	Party A agrees to pay Party B a service fee (&#147;
<B>
	Service Fee
</B>
	&#148;)
	equivalent to Party B&#146;s Costs in providing the Services, plus 30% of such
	Costs. The Parties agree to periodically review the Service Fee and to
	make adjustments to the Service Fee as deemed appropriate to maintain an
	arm&#146;s length compensation.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	3.2
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Expenses
</B>
	. In addition to the Service Fee, Party A
	shall reimburse Party B for all Expenses incurred in the provision of the
	Services. Such Expenses shall be reimbursed at cost.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	3.3
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Method of Payment
</B>
	. The Service Fee shall be
	payable, and Expenses shall be reimbursed, in arrears on a quarterly basis
	within 10 days after the end of each calendar quarter to a bank account
	designated by Party B (net of all bank handling fees). Promptly after
	receiving each payment of the Service Fee and Expenses, Party B shall
	provide Party A with an official invoice for the same.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	3.4
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Access to Books and Records
</B>
	. For purposes of
	verifying the Service Fee and Expenses, Party A agrees to grant Party B
	complete access to its financial records during normal business hours upon
	receipt of reasonable written notice from Party B, provided that such
	access does not cause undue disruption to Party A&#146;s business
	operations.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	4.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY OWNERSHIP
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	For the avoidance of doubt, the parties agree that any
	invention, modification, creation, or design created or developed by Party
	B during its performance of this Agreement, and all related copyrights,
	trademarks, patents and all other intellectual property rights, whether
	registered or not, shall be owned exclusively by Party B. Where such
	ownership is precluded due to PRC law, Party A undertakes to sign any
	documents and take, or cause to be taken, any other action necessary, to
	effect the complete and irrevocable assignment of the said ownership
	rights to Party B.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

<TD WIDTH="5%">

</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	5.1.6
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	there is no on-going or pending dispute, action,
	arbitration, administrative procedure or other legal proceeding relating
	to its assets or itself.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	5.2
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Party A.
</B>
	Party A further represents and warrants
	that, as of the date of signing hereof, it has all necessary licenses and
	approvals to engage in the provision of technology information
	services.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	5.3
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Party B.
</B>
	Party B further represents and warrants
	that, as of the date of signing hereof, it is duly authorized to provide
	the Services in the PRC.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	6.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	CONFIDENTIALITY
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Confidentiality Obligations.
</B>
	Each party
	(&#147;
<B>
	Receiving Party
</B>
	&#148;) shall maintain the strict confidentiality of
	any and all Confidential Information of the other party (&#147;
<B>
	Disclosing
	Party
</B>
	&#148;) to which it may become privy before or during the performance
	of this Agreement, and shall not disclose any such Confidential
	Information to any third party except to its relevant employees,
	affiliates, officers and advisors (as applicable) on a &#147;need-to-know&#148;
	basis and provided that the aforesaid recipients of Confidential
	Information are subject to written confidentiality undertakings which are
	no less strict than the obligations set forth herein. Any Confidential
	Information of the Disclosing Party which is received by the Receiving
	Party hereunder shall be used for the sole purpose of performing this
	Agreement and such other purpose as the Disclosing Party shall have
	permitted in writing.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=LEFT>
	Technical Services
	Agreement
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=CENTER WIDTH="33%">
	-&nbsp;4 -
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="33%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
