<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.2
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Exceptions.
</B>
	The disclosure of Confidential
	Information by the Receiving Party shall not be deemed a breach of its
	confidentiality obligations under the following circumstances;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.2.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Disclosing Party has given its prior written consent
	to the disclosure;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.2.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Confidential Information has entered the public
	domain through no fault or wrongful act of the Receiving Party;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.2.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Confidential Information has been rightfully received
	by the Receiving Party from a third party which developed such information
	independently and was not subject to any confidentiality obligation with
	regard to the same;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.2.4
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	the Confidential Information was, prior to this Agreement
	or any other separate non-disclosure agreement previously existing between
	the parties, independently developed by the Receiving Party without use,
	directly or indirectly, of the Confidential Information; or
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	6.2.5
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	where the disclosure of Confidential Information is
	required pursuant to a law or court order of competent jurisdiction,
	provided that such disclosure shall be limited to the extent required by
	such applicable law or court order, and provided further that the
	Receiving Party has notified the Disclosing Party of the need to disclose
	the Confidential Information in question, such that the Disclosing Party
	shall have the opportunity to oppose the disclosure thereof by means of
	any available objections or appeals.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	TERM AND TERMINATION
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.1
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Term
</B>
	. This Agreement will take effect on the date
	first set forth above and shall continue indefinitely with full force and
	effect until it is terminated pursuant to Article 7.2.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;

	&nbsp;

</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.2
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Termination
</B>
	. This Agreement may be terminated as
	follows:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.2.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	with the mutual written consent of the parties;
	and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.2.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	by the non-breaching party by means of written notice
	with immediate effect, where the other party has breached this Agreement
	as set forth in Article 8.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	7.3
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Survival
</B>
	. The confidentiality and payment
	obligations of the parties (including without limitation any payment
	obligations relating to the breach or termination of this
	Agreement), shall survive the termination of this Agreement for any reason
	indefinitely.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	8.
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	BREACH
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	8.1
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Breach
</B>
	. A party shall be deemed to be in breach of
	this Agreement if:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	8.1.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	it fails to perform its obligations under this Agreement
	fully and in a timely manner, and does not rectify any such failure within
	30 days after written demand from any other party requesting the same;
	or
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	8.1.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	any representation or warranty made by such party
	hereunder proves to be or becomes materially false, misleading or
	untrue.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	8.2
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Liability for Breach
</B>
	. If either party breaches
	this Agreement, it shall indemnify the other party against, and compensate
	it for, any damages or loss incurred as a result, including third party
	claims.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	9.
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	FORCE MAJEURE
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	9.1
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	A party who is not able to perform its obligations
	hereunder as a direct result of Force Majeure shall not be deemed to be in
	breach of this Agreement, provided that the following conditions are
	satisfied simultaneously:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	9.1.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	its failure to perform its obligations hereunder shall be
	directly caused by Force Majeure;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	9.1.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	it has used commercially reasonable efforts to perform
	its obligations hereunder and, has taken necessary precautions to reduce
	the losses to the other parties arising from the Force Majeure;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	9.1.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	it has immediately informed the other parties in writing
	after the occurrence of Force Majeure; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	9.1.4
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	it has provided written information and supporting
	documentation, including a statement of the reasons for the delay in
	implementing or partially implementing this Agreement, within 15 days
	after the occurrence of Force Majeure.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	10.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	GOVERNING LAW
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=3>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in
	accordance with the laws of the PRC.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>

<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=LEFT>
	Technical Services
	Agreement
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-TOP: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=CENTER WIDTH="33%">

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ALIGN=CENTER WIDTH="100%" COLOR=BLACK NOSHADE SIZE=5>
<A NAME="eolPage284"></A>
<!--$$/PAGE=-->
<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-37_HTM_PAGE_9">
</A>
<BR>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	11.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	DISPUTE RESOLUTION
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	If any dispute arises in connection with this Agreement,
	the parties shall attempt in the first instance to resolve it through
	friendly consultations or mediation. If any dispute cannot be resolved
	within 30 days after the commencement of discussions, such dispute shall
	be referred to and finally resolved by arbitration in Beijing under the
	auspices of the China International Economic and Trade Arbitration
	Commission in accordance with the Commission&#146;s then-current arbitration
	rules. The arbitration shall be conducted in both the Chinese and English
	languages before a tribunal of 3 arbitrators appointed in accordance with
	the said rules.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The arbitral award shall be final and binding on the
	parties. The winning party may, at the cost and expense of the losing
	party, apply to any court of competent jurisdiction for enforcement of
	such arbitral award.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	11.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	During the period when the dispute is being resolved,
	except for the matters under dispute, the parties shall continue
	performing this Agreement in all respects.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	12.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	MISCELLANEOUS
</B>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	12.1
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Notices.
</B>
	All notices or other communications
	hereunder shall be written in English, and delivered in person (including
	by courier), by first class mail or facsimile, to the addresses set forth
	below. A notice shall be deemed to have been delivered (a) on the date of
	signing of the delivery receipt in the case of delivery in person
	(including by courier); (b) on the 10
<SUP>
	th
</SUP>
	day of the mailing date
	in the case of delivery by mail; and (c) on the date recorded in the
	transmission record in the case of facsimile, unless delivery is made
	after 5 pm on a Business Day or on a non-Business Day in the place of
	receipt, in which case delivery shall be deemed to occur at 9 am on the
	following Business Day.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	12.2
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Entire Agreement.
</B>
	This Agreement and its appendix
	attached hereto constitute the entire agreement between the parties in
	respect of the subject matter hereof and shall supersede any previous
	discussions, negotiations and agreements related thereto.
</P>
</TD>

</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	12.3
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Amendment.
</B>
	This Agreement may be amended only by a
	written agreement signed by the parties, which amendment shall be attached
	to this Agreement as an Appendix. If required by law, the parties shall
	obtain all requisite approvals from the relevant authorities to give
	effect to the amendment.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	12.4
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	No Waiver.
</B>
	Unless otherwise agreed upon by the
	parties in writing, any failure or delay on the part of either party to
	exercise any right, authority or privilege under this Agreement, or under
	any other related agreement, shall not operate as a waiver thereof; nor
	shall any single or partial exercise of any right, authority or privilege
	preclude any other future exercise thereof.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	12.5
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Severability.
</B>
	The provisions of this Agreement are
	severable from each other. The invalidity of any provision of this
	Agreement shall not affect the validity or enforceability of any other
	provision of this Agreement.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	12.6
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Taxes and Fees.
</B>
	Unless otherwise stipulated
	herein, each party shall be responsible for any stamp duties, taxes and
	out-of-pocket expenses (including legal fees) incurred by it in connection
	with the preparation and performance of this Agreement.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;

	12.7
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Successors.
</B>
	This Agreement shall be binding upon
	the parties, their respective successors and assigns (if any).
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	12.8
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Assignment.
</B>
	Party A shall not assign any its
	rights or obligations hereunder without the prior written consent of Party
	B. Party B shall have the right to assign all or any of its rights or
	obligations under this Agreement to any third party (whether a natural
	person or legal entity) at any time. Party A shall cooperate fully with
	Party B to affect any such assignment, including without limitation
	signing any documentation.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	12.9
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Counterparts.
</B>
	For the convenience of the parties,
	this Agreement may be executed in any number of counterparts. Each such
	counterpart shall be deemed to be an original instrument, and all such
	counterparts shall together constitute one and the same
	instrument.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ALIGN=CENTER WIDTH="100%" COLOR=BLACK NOSHADE SIZE=5>
<A NAME="eolPage288"></A>
<!--$$/PAGE=-->
<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-37_HTM_PAGE_13">
</A>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Appendix I
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
<U>
	Scope of Services
</U>
</B>
<B>
</B>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
<B>
	1.
</B>
</TD>
<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Technical Services.
</B>
	Party B will provide technical
	services and training to Party A, taking advantage of Party B&#146;s advanced
	software development and system integration technologies to improve Party
	A&#146;s system integration. Such technical services shall include:
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	administering, managing and maintaining information
	application systems and website system infrastructure;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	providing system optimisation plans and implementing
	optimisation features;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	procuring, installing and supporting Party B&#146;s products,
	and providing training regarding the use of those products;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	managing and maintaining networks and providing
	technology to assure the reliability and efficiency thereof; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(e)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	providing information technology services and assuring
	the reliable operation of information infrastructure.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>

<B>
	2.
</B>

<TD COLSPAN=2>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<B>
	Marketing and Management Consulting.
</B>
	For the
	purposes of expanding Party A&#146;s market share, marketing its products and
	creating an efficient internal operation for Party A, Party B will provide
	consulting services regarding marketing and management. Such consulting
	services shall include:
</P>
</TD>

</TD>
<TD>

	recommending partners to Party A, and assisting Party A to establish and
	develop cooperative relationships with partners for the development of
	information networks and value-added telecommunication services;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>

<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>

	(b)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	providing Party A with market development strategies,
	including without limitation advice on the design and improvement of Party
	A&#146;s products, services and business model; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>

</TD>
<TD>

	training management personnel and providing management
	consultation services, including without limitation regular business
	training for Party A's management personnel and formulating practical and
	effective solutions to existing problems with respect to Party A&#146;s
	business operations.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>

	&nbsp;

	finance-related services with respect to Party A&#146;s business, including

</A>
<P ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
	Spousal Consent
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The undersigned, Liu Qing, a People&#146;s Republic of China
	(&#147;
<B>
	PRC
</B>
	&#148;) citizen with PRC ID Card No.: 31010419710314162x, is the lawful
	spouse of Wu Bing, a PRC citizen with PRC ID Card No.: 310104196806292016. I
	hereby unconditionally and irrevocably agree to the execution of the following
	documents by Wu Bing on
<U>
	January 25, 2016
</U>
	, and the disposal of the equity
	interests of Beijing Sino Top Scope Technology Co., Ltd. (&#147;
<B>
	Company
</B>
	&#148;) held
	by Wu Bing and registered in his name according to the following documents:
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The Equity Pledge Agreement entered into between the
<B>
	YOU On Demand (Beijing) Technology Co., Ltd. (&#147;WFOE
</B>
	&#148;), Wu Bing and
	Zhu Yun;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The Call Option Agreement entered into between the WFOE,
	Wu Bing, Zhu Yun and the Company; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The Power of Attorney executed by Wu
	Bing.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	(collectively, &#147;
<B>
	Transaction Documents
</B>
	&#148;).
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	I hereby undertake not to make any assertions in connection
	with the equity interests of the Company which are held by Wu Bing. I hereby
	further confirm that Wu Bing can perform the Transaction Documents and further
	amend or terminate the Transaction Documents absent authorization or consent
	from me.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	I hereby undertake to execute all necessary documents and take
	all necessary actions to ensure appropriate performance of the Transaction
	Documents (as amended from time to time) upon the WFOE&#146;s request.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	I hereby agree and undertake that if I obtain any equity
	interests of the Company which are held by Wu Bing for any reasons, I shall be
	bound by the Transaction Documents, as well as the Technical Services Agreement
	entered into between the WFOE and the Company as of January 25, 2016 and comply
	with the obligations thereunder as a shareholder of the Company. For this
	purpose, upon the WFOE&#146;s request, I shall sign a series of written documents in
	substantially the same format and content as the Transaction Documents, as well
	as the Technical Services Agreement.
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="5%">
	Name:
</TD>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="43%">
	&nbsp;
<B>
	Liu Qing
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>

	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="43%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>

<TD ALIGN=LEFT>
	&nbsp;
</TD>

	By:
</TD>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=LEFT WIDTH="43%">
	/s/
	Liu Qing
</TD>

<TD ALIGN=LEFT>
	&nbsp;
</TD>

	, and the disposal of the equity

	entered into between the WFOE and the Company as of January 24, 2016 and comply
	with the obligations thereunder as a shareholder of the Company. For this
	purpose, upon the WFOE&#146;s request, I shall sign a series of written documents in
	substantially the same format and content as the Transaction Documents, as well
	as the Technical Services Agreement.

<A NAME="eolPage292"></A>
<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-39_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_10>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_10_13"></A>
<HR NOSHADE ALIGN="CENTER" WIDTH=100% SIZE=3 COLOR="BLACK">
<!--$$/PAGE=-->
<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-39_HTM_PAGE_1">
</A>
<P ALIGN=RIGHT>
	January 25, 2016
<B>
</B>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT>
	Wu Bing
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT>
	No.92, Alley 15, Guiping Road, Xuhui District, Shanghai,PRC
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Dear Wu Bing,
</P>
<P ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
<U>
	Re: Indemnification and Release of Claims
</U>
</B>
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	We are delighted that you have been assisting YOU On Demand
	(Beijing) Technology Co., Ltd. (&#147;
<B>
	WFOE
</B>
	&#148;) with our business plans in the
	People&#146;s Republic of China.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	For the purpose of clarifying the relationship between you and
	the WFOE, this Letter of Indemnification and Release (&#147;
<B>
	Letter
</B>
	&#148;) sets out
	below the general terms of the arrangement between you and the WFOE, which is
	further described in the relevant documents.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	You have assumed and will continue to assume the role of a
	nominee shareholder of Beijing Sino Top Scope Technology Co., Ltd., a limited
	liability company established in Beijing (&#147;
<B>
	Company
</B>
	&#148;). You agree to hold
	95% of the entire equity interests in the Company, representing RMB 4.275
	million in the registered capital of the Company, pursuant to the terms of a
	Call Option Agreement and an Equity Pledge Agreement, as well as other related
	documents (&#147;
<B>
	Trustee Documents
</B>
	&#148;).
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	You agree and accept that you will not assume any liability
	that might arise from your role as a nominee shareholder of the Company, and
	conversely you will not be entitled to dividends or other benefits generated
	therefrom, or receive any compensation in connection with this arrangement.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<U>
	Indemnification and Release of Claims
</U>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Provided that you fully perform and comply with the Trustee
	Documents and all instructions, as they relate to the Trustee Documents, issued
	by the WFOE, the WFOE agrees to indemnify you against any personal, tax or other
	liabilities incurred in connection with your role in the equity transfer and as
	a nominee shareholder of the Company to the greatest extent permitted by law.
	the WFOE will waive and release you unconditionally from any claims arising
	from, or related to, your role as the Company&#146;s shareholder, provided that your
	actions to fulfill your responsibilities as a nominee shareholder are taken in
	good faith and are not opposed to the Company&#146;s best interests.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<U>
	Duration
</U>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The arrangement described above is deemed to have commenced
	automatically as at the time when you become a shareholder of the Company. The
	arrangement will remain valid until either you or the WFOE terminates this
	Letter by giving the other party hereto sixty (60) days&#146; prior written notice.
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=CENTER>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD ALIGN=CENTER>
	- 1 -
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<BR>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ALIGN=CENTER WIDTH="100%" COLOR=BLACK NOSHADE SIZE=5>
<A NAME="eolPage293"></A>
<!--$$/PAGE=-->
<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-39_HTM_PAGE_2">
</A>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<U>
	Confidentiality
</U>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The confidentiality of this arrangement is of the utmost
	importance. Therefore, we request that you agree to keep the contents of this
	Letter completely confidential, and refrain from disclosing its contents to
	anyone, in words or in substance. Notwithstanding the preceding sentence, you
	may, however, disclose the terms and amount of this Letter to: (a) your
	immediate family, tax or other financial advisor, and/or lawyer, provided that
	you first obtain such person&#146;s agreement to keep any such matters completely
	confidential and not to disclose them to anyone; and (b) the extent required by
	law or to the extent necessary to enforce your rights under this Letter.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<U>
	Entire Agreement
</U>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	With the exception of any employment agreement between you and
	the WFOE or its affiliates, this Letter supersedes any and all prior or
	contemporaneous oral and/or written agreements between you and the WFOE and sets
	out the entire agreement between you and the WFOE. No variations or
	modifications hereof will be deemed valid unless set out in writing and signed
	by the parties hereto.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<U>
	Choice of Law and Dispute Resolution
</U>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	This Letter is governed exclusively by the laws of the People&#146;s
	Republic of China without giving effect to the conflict of laws principles
	thereof. The provisions of this Letter are severable, and if for any reason any
	part hereof is found to be unenforceable, the remaining portions will be
	enforceable in full. If any dispute arises from or in connection with this
	Letter, you and the WFOE shall first attempt to reach a resolution through
	amiable negotiation. If such dispute cannot be resolved within thirty (30) days
	after the commencement of such negotiation, the dispute shall be submitted to
	China International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission (&#147;
<B>
	CIETAC
</B>
	&#148;)
	for arbitration which shall be conducted in accordance with the CIETAC&#146;s
	arbitration rules in effect at the time of applying for arbitration. The
	arbitral award will be final and binding upon both parties. The arbitration
	shall be conducted in [both the English and Chinese languages] before a tribunal
	of three (3) arbitrators appointed in accordance with the CIETAC&#146;s arbitration
	rules in effect at the time of applying for arbitration.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Again, on behalf of
<B>
<I>
</I>
</B>
	the WFOE, we extend to you
	our most sincere thanks and gratitude for your kind assistance.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Please let us know if you have any questions.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Sincerely,
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>

	For and on behalf of
</I>
</TD>

</B>

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ALIGN=CENTER WIDTH="100%" COLOR=BLACK NOSHADE SIZE=5>
<A NAME="eolPage295"></A>
<!--$$/PAGE=-->
<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-39_HTM_PAGE_4">
</A>
<P ALIGN=RIGHT>
	January 25, 2016
<B>
</B>
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT>
	Zhu Yun
</TD>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN=TOP>
<TD ALIGN=LEFT>
	No.501, Room 13, 15th Floor, Liuheyuan, Shijingshan
	District, Beijing, PRC.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Dear Zhu Yun,
</P>
<P ALIGN=CENTER>
<B>
<U>
	Re: Indemnification and Release of Claims
</U>
</B>
<B>
</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	We are delighted that you have been assisting YOU On Demand
	(Beijing) Technology Co., Ltd. (&#147;
<B>
	WFOE
</B>
	&#148;) with our business plans in the
	People&#146;s Republic of China.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	For the purpose of clarifying the relationship between you and
	the WFOE, this Letter of Indemnification and Release (&#147;
<B>
	Letter
</B>
	&#148;) sets out
	below the general terms of the arrangement between you and the WFOE, which is
	further described in the relevant documents.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	You have assumed and will continue to assume the role of a
	nominee shareholder of Beijing Sino Top Scope Technology Co., Ltd., a limited
	liability company established in Beijing (&#147;
<B>
	Company
</B>
	&#148;). You agree to hold
	5% of the entire equity interests in the Company, representing RMB 0.225 million
	in the registered capital of the Company, pursuant to the terms of a Call Option
	Agreement and an Equity Pledge Agreement, as well as other related documents
	(&#147;
<B>
	Trustee Documents
</B>
	&#148;).
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	You agree and accept that you will not assume any liability
	that might arise from your role as a nominee shareholder of the Company, and
	conversely you will not be entitled to dividends or other benefits generated
	therefrom, or receive any compensation in connection with this arrangement.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<U>
	Indemnification and Release of Claims
</U>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Provided that you fully perform and comply with the Trustee
	Documents and all instructions, as they relate to the Trustee Documents, issued
	by the WFOE, the WFOE agrees to indemnify you against any personal, tax or other
	liabilities incurred in connection with your role in the equity transfer and as
	a nominee shareholder of the Company to the greatest extent permitted by law.
	the WFOE will waive and release you unconditionally from any claims arising
	from, or related to, your role as the Company&#146;s shareholder, provided that your
	actions to fulfill your responsibilities as a nominee shareholder are taken in
	good faith and are not opposed to the Company&#146;s best interests.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<U>
	Duration
</U>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The arrangement described above is deemed to have commenced
	automatically as at the time when you become a shareholder of the Company. The
	arrangement will remain valid until either you or the WFOE terminates this
	Letter by giving the other party hereto sixty (60) days&#146; prior written notice.
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 1PX SOLID" ALIGN=CENTER>
	&nbsp;
</TD>

	-&nbsp;4 -

<A NAME="eolPage296"></A>
<!--$$/PAGE=-->
<A NAME="EXHIBIT10-39_HTM_PAGE_5">
</A>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<U>
	Confidentiality
</U>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The confidentiality of this arrangement is of the utmost
	importance. Therefore, we request that you agree to keep the contents of this
	Letter completely confidential, and refrain from disclosing its contents to
	anyone, in words or in substance. Notwithstanding the preceding sentence, you
	may, however, disclose the terms and amount of this Letter to: (a) your
	immediate family, tax or other financial advisor, and/or lawyer, provided that
	you first obtain such person&#146;s agreement to keep any such matters completely
	confidential and not to disclose them to anyone; and (b) the extent required by
	law or to the extent necessary to enforce your rights under this Letter.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<U>
	Entire Agreement
</U>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	With the exception of any employment agreement between you and
	the WFOE or its affiliates, this Letter supersedes any and all prior or
	contemporaneous oral and/or written agreements between you and the WFOE and sets
	out the entire agreement between you and the WFOE. No variations or
	modifications hereof will be deemed valid unless set out in writing and signed
	by the parties hereto.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
<U>
	Choice of Law and Dispute Resolution
</U>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	This Letter is governed exclusively by the laws of the People&#146;s
	Republic of China without giving effect to the conflict of laws principles
	thereof. The provisions of this Letter are severable, and if for any reason any
	part hereof is found to be unenforceable, the remaining portions will be
	enforceable in full. If any dispute arises from or in connection with this
	Letter, you and the WFOE shall first attempt to reach a resolution through
	amiable negotiation. If such dispute cannot be resolved within thirty (30) days
	after the commencement of such negotiation, the dispute shall be submitted to
	China International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission (&#147;
<B>
	CIETAC
</B>
	&#148;)
	for arbitration which shall be conducted in accordance with the CIETAC&#146;s
	arbitration rules in effect at the time of applying for arbitration. The
	arbitral award will be final and binding upon both parties. The arbitration
	shall be conducted in [both the English and Chinese languages] before a tribunal
	of three (3) arbitrators appointed in accordance with the CIETAC&#146;s arbitration
	rules in effect at the time of applying for arbitration.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Again, on behalf of
<B>
<I>
</I>
</B>
	the WFOE, we extend to you
	our most sincere thanks and gratitude for your kind assistance.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Please let us know if you have any questions.
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Sincerely,
</P>

<FONT SIZE="2">
	Consent of Independent Registered Public
	Accounting Firm
</FONT>
</B>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	The Board of Directors
<BR>
	YOD On Demand Holdings, Inc.:
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	We consent to the incorporation by reference in the
	registration statements (No. 333-184192 and 333-193786) on Form S-3/A of YOU On
	Demand Holdings, Inc. of our report dated March 30, 2016, with respect to the
	consolidated balance sheets of YOU On Demand Holdings, Inc. as of December 31,
	2015 and 2014, and the related consolidated statements of operations,
	comprehensive loss, equity and cash flows for the years then ended, which report
	appears in the December 31, 2015 annual report on Form 10-K of YOU On Demand
	Holdings, Inc..
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="2">
	Our report dated March 30, 2016 contains an explanatory
	paragraph that states that the Company incurred net losses from continuing
	operations and had accumulated deficits that raise substantial doubt about its
	ability to continue as a going concern. The consolidated financial statements do
	not include any adjustments that might result from the outcome of this
	uncertainty.
<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
	/s/ KPMG Huazhen LLP
<BR>
	Beijing, China
<BR>
<BR>
<BR>
	March 30, 2016
</FONT>
</P>

<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	The registrant&#146;s other certifying officer and I are
	responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and
	procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and
	internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act
	Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</P>

	a)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or
	caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our
	supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the
	registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us
	by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which
	this report is being prepared;
</P>
</TD>

<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	b)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting,
	or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed
	under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the
	reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial
	statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted
	accounting principles;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	c)
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#146;s
	disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our
	conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and
	procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on
	such evaluation; and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;

</TD>

<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#146;s
	internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the
	registrant&#146;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#146;s fourth fiscal
	quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or
	is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#146;s internal
	control over financial reporting; and

</TD>

</B>
</P>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>

</P>

	Demand Holdings, Inc.;

	untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact
	necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under
	which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period
	covered by this report;
</P>
</TD>

	The undersigned, Mingcheng Tao, Chief Executive Officer of YOU
	ON DEMAND HOLDINGS, INC. (the &#147;Company&#148;), DOES HEREBY CERTIFY that:
</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLOR: BLACK; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; BORDER-COLLAPSE: COLLAPSE; " CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0 WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 BCLLIST>

<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>

	1.
</TD>
<TD>

	The Company&#146;s Annual Report on Form 10-K for the fiscal
	year ended December 31, 2015 (the &#147;Report&#148;), fully complies with the
	requirements of Section 13(a) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934;
	and
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD>
	&nbsp;
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	2.
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Information contained in the Report fairly presents, in
	all material respects, the financial condition and results of operation of
	the Company.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned has executed this statement
	this 30
<SUP>
	th
</SUP>
	day of March, 2016.

	and Exchange Commission pursuant to &#167; 18 U.S.C. Section 1350. It is not being

</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%">
	&nbsp;
</TD>
<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH="5%">
	2.
</TD>
<TD>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	Information contained in the Report fairly presents, in
	all material respects, the financial condition and results of operation of
	the Company.
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P ALIGN=JUSTIFY>
	IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the undersigned has executed this statement
	this 30
<SUP>
	th
</SUP>
	day of March, 2016.
</P>
